definition: mapo tofu/stir-fried beancurd in chili sauce
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: Only with this can be called the seven characteristics of authentic Mapo tofu.
sentences.chinese: 只有具备了这七大特点才能称得上是正宗的麻婆豆腐。

sentences.english: We have roast Peking duck, "Ma por"bean curd, and braised sea cucumber with minced meat.
sentences.chinese: 我们有北京烤鸭，麻婆豆腐和肉末烧海参。

sentences.english: I think Mapo Tofu are quite special.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得麻婆豆腐味道不错。

sentences.english: You can taste the Mapo Tofu.
sentences.chinese: 你可以尝尝这道麻婆豆腐。

sentences.english: Please cancel Mapo beancurd if it is not done.
sentences.chinese: 如果麻婆豆腐还没烧，请取消。

sentences.english: Ma Po's bean curd is a specialty in our restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 本店的当家菜是麻婆豆腐。

sentences.english: Do you know what you want to have?
I would recommend Mapo Beancurd. It's a famous Sichuan food.
sentences.chinese: 我会推荐麻婆豆腐，这是著名的川菜。

sentences.english: I like roast duck and mapo tofu.
sentences.chinese: 我想要烤鸭和麻婆豆腐。

definition: pork strips stir-fried with yuxiang 魚香|鱼香[yu2 xiang1]
duck's blood and beef tripe in spicy soup
Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
popular Sichuan cold dish made of thinly sliced beef and beef offal
Sichuan poached sliced fish in hot chili oil
